attributes.action: Officially accuse the Palestinian government of war crimes / crimes against humanity
attributes.additional_details:
We should accuse the Hamas government in Gaza of committing war crimes / crimes against humanity, relating to:

The lack of bomb shelters for civilians
Using its civilian population as human shields and admitting it in Arabic.
Firing rockets from civilian areas
Telling civilian population to ignore Israeli Army evacuation orders
Firing rockets at Israeli civilians

We also demand that Hamas is disarmed and destroyed  as there will never be peace or a peace process with jihadists committed to Jewish Genocide & an Islamic state on the ashes of Israel.
